isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - INSTALL - AIR LINES AND AIR FILTER/REGULATOR

note.para: Recommended sealant for fittings is International Sealant part number 554209C1. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION AND SEALERS in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve ( inset, Figure 292) and the HI Range Port of the range cylinder. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 292. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and HI Range Port of Range Cylinder

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve ( inset, Figure 293) and the LO Range Port of the range cylinder. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 293. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and LO Range Port of Range Cylinder

step1.para: Position the air filter/regulator on the auxiliary housing rear and install the two retaining bolts ( Figure 294). Tighten to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N· m).

figure.caption: Figure 294. Position Air Filter/Regulator on Auxiliary Housing Rear and Install Retaining Bolts

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve ( inset, Figure 295) and the air filter/regulator. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 295. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and Air Filter/Regulator

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the air filter/regulator ( inset, Figure 296) and the splitter cylinder cover. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 296. Connect Air Hose Between Air Filter/Regulator and Splitter Cylinder Cover

step1.para: Install the Roadranger valve cover and the three air lines ( Figure 297).

figure.caption: Figure 297. Install Roadranger Valve Cover and Air Lines

step1.para: Install the jam nut on the shift lever. Thread the Roadranger valve on the shift lever and secure by tightening jam nut against the valve ( Figure 298).

figure.caption: Figure 298. Thread Roadranger Valve on Shift Lever and Secure

step1.para: Connect the red air line to the "S" or Supply Port and the black air line to the "P" or End Port of the slave valve ( Figure 299). Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 299. Connect Red Air Line to Supply Port and Black Air Line to End Port of Slave Valve

step1.para: Connect the red air line to the "S" or Supply Port and the black air line to the "P" or End Port on the Roadranger valve ( Figure 300). Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 300. Connect Red Air Line to Supply Port and Black Air Line to End Port of Roadranger Valve

step1.para: Connect the blue air line to the "SP" or Splitter Port on the Roadranger valve ( inset, Figure 301). Connect the blue air line to the splitter cylinder cover. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 301. Connect Blue Air Line to Splitter Port on Roadranger Valve and Blue Air Line to Splitter Cylinder Cover

step1.para: Position the valve cover on the Roadranger valve and secure by tightening the two mounting screws in the cover ( Figure 302).

figure.caption: Figure 302. Position Valve Cover on Roadranger Valve and Secure
